summary: This mod adds the Standalone Follower Metis to skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/headers/88920.jpg?check=1515826479[/img]

[youtube]IBvoNrsiVD8[/youtube]
Video by tomze[/center]
Hi. I am ARTA14.
I am not good at English. So I use a translator.

This mod adds the Nord Warrior Metis to skyrim.
She is essential, And you can marry her. XD

Depending on the ENB you use, it may be different from the screenshot I uploaded.(I use anko ENB.)
I don't want you to be disappointed after you install this mode.
[u][b]So, please see the vanilla screenshot without the ENB applied.[/b][/u]

I wonder what my character will look like on someone else's skyrim.
If you don't mind, please post your great screenshot!

Thank you.

[b]Follower Information[/b]
Name : Metis
Race : Nord
Combat Style : Two-Handed
Location : Warmaiden's(Whiterun)
Body Style : CBBE / UNP(B)
Perks : LightFoot

[b]My other Mod
[b][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14749]ARTA Follower Metis SSE(Standalone)[/url][/b][/b][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89011]ARTA Follower Aurora(Standalone)[/url][b]
[b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14724]ARTA Follower Aurora SSE(Standalone)[/url]﻿﻿[/b]

Eye colours with new style Eyelashes : I lost my link.
author: ARTA14
